title: Vibe Vision
description: A full‑stack web app that detects emotions from facial expressions—via webcam or uploaded images—and includes an AI chatbot powered by an LLM for personalized advice and emotional support.

title: CampusKart
description: A college‑only marketplace where students can buy, sell, donate, or borrow items within their campus community—secured by verified user accounts, role-based permissions, and built-in payment integration.

title: Twianalyzer
description: A machine learning app using K‑Nearest Neighbors and the Sentiment140 dataset to analyze tweet sentiment, featuring interactive options for filtering and sorting tweets by length and alphabetical order.

title: FitTrack
description: A fully responsive React.js fitness web app built with Material UI and RapidAPI, offering 1,000+ exercises by muscle group—with integrated YouTube recommendations to guide users through workouts.

title: QuickCart
description: A full-stack Blinkit clone using React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It features a responsive UI, admin panel, secure auth, product management, Stripe payments, and dynamic cart/checkout flow.

title: Weather App
description: A dynamic, responsive weather app that integrates the OpenWeather API to fetch and display real-time temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions.
